text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires stating that the TDM exception (s.29A CDPA 1988) only permits copying for the sole purpose of non-commercial research. The candidate answer explicitly states this: \"In the UK, there is a Text and Data Mining (TDM) exception (Copyright, Designs and Patents Act 1988, s.29A), but it is narrow: - It\u2019s generally limited to non-commercial research. - It doesn\u2019t cover \u2018we trained a commercial model for paying users.\u2019\"", "criterion_id": "31a75734-17b8-403e-b2ce-6c5008078368"}
